data.text:
@sciencemuseum @RoxanaHalls @WestHertsNHS @RaiseWestHerts It is an awesome painting !

I did a couple of the folks giving vaccines, I am in awe of their efforts. https://t.co/YQQzsI0xjx
Roxana features on episode 1 of @bbcarts Extraordinary Portraits presented by @tinie (on right now on @BBCOne)

The painting was created as part of the #PortraitsforNHSHeroes project started by @tomartist32 in response to the pandemic. 

Her colleague Natalie Miles-Kemp (@laughdancedog) nominated Katie for the project in recognition of Katieâ€™s leadership during the pandemic.
